titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on 50% Homopolymer, 3-(Dimethylamino) Propyl Amide, Di-Me Sulfate-Quarternized 50% Polyricinoleic Acid.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 10/29/2009--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on 50% Homopolymer, 3-(Dimethylamino) Propyl Amide, Di-Me Sulfate-Quarternized 50% Polyricinoleic Acid.
